dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3757096X] Copyright Abuse
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 05, 2007 1:07 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3757096X] Copyright Abuse

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright Abuse
Added by system at Thursday, Apr 5 2007 06:02 am 
X-MailFrom: redaction@algerie-dz.com 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Thu Apr 5 06:02:55 2007

MIME element (text/plain) 
Hello, 
 
We noted that a site that you host, namely www.algerieannonces.com, plagiarized
hundreds of articles from our site algerie-dz.com without any authorization from us.

 
These are some examples : 
 
 
http://www.algerieannonces.com/affi_news.php?numero=21845&titre=Une vingtaine de
